00020 #ifndef CO_CONNECTIONTYPE_H
00021 #define CO_CONNECTIONTYPE_H
00022 
00023 #include <lunchbox/debug.h>
00024 #include <iostream>
00025 
00026 namespace co
00027 {
00029     enum ConnectionType
00030     {
00031         CONNECTIONTYPE_NONE = 0,
00032         CONNECTIONTYPE_TCPIP,     
00033         CONNECTIONTYPE_SDP,       
00034         CONNECTIONTYPE_PIPE,      
00035         CONNECTIONTYPE_NAMEDPIPE, 
00036         CONNECTIONTYPE_IB,        
00037         CONNECTIONTYPE_RDMA,      
00038         CONNECTIONTYPE_UDT,       
00039         CONNECTIONTYPE_MULTICAST = 0x100, 
00040         CONNECTIONTYPE_RSP        
00041     };
00042 
00044     inline std::ostream& operator << ( std::ostream& os,
00045                                        const ConnectionType& type )
00046     {
00047         switch( type )
00048         {
00049             case CONNECTIONTYPE_TCPIP: return os << "TCPIP";
00050             case CONNECTIONTYPE_SDP: return os << "SDP";
00051             case CONNECTIONTYPE_PIPE: return os << "ANON_PIPE";
00052             case CONNECTIONTYPE_NAMEDPIPE: return os << "PIPE";
00053             case CONNECTIONTYPE_RSP: return os << "RSP";
00054             case CONNECTIONTYPE_NONE: return os << "NONE";
00055             case CONNECTIONTYPE_RDMA: return os << "RDMA";
00056             case CONNECTIONTYPE_UDT: return os << "UDT";
00057 
00058             default:
00059                 LBASSERTINFO( false, "Not implemented" );
00060                 return os << "ERROR";
00061         }
00062         return os;
00063     }
00064 }
00065 
00066 #endif // CO_CONNECTIONTYPE_H
